column2: "prediction": "The article discusses the challenges faced by the Murtala Muhammed International Airport 2 (MMA2) in Lagos
column4: particularly in terms of its management and operations. The airport
column5: which was built to alleviate the pressure on the old Murtala Muhammed Airport
column6: has been facing issues such as inadequate facilities
column8: and inefficient management. The article highlights the concerns of various stakeholders
